name: AdventureOfBrushWeb
description:
2d fast paced adventure-rpg  Inspired by dark souls , bloodborne etc.With unique art-style.

NOTE:This is demo(only tutorial area + boss)

Link to downloable Game +oldProject(AdventureOfBrushZero):

https://aleksavelimirovic.itch.io/adventureofbrush-demo

CONTROLS

A,D - MOVE

Space - jump

P-Attack

O-Dash

I - inventory

E - interact

ESC - menu
